messages.content:
We need to use sessions and resume sessions when using agent : 

1) when chatting, we should always resume the session and only send new message
2) When we create an agent to work on something, we store the session. When we start a new work (review, build, chat, etc ..) we have a little button "use a previous session" which let use select a previous session. Each session can only be slected if from the same agent, and will be named from the last work they did.
